title: Mum 'let 64-year-old family friend rape her two young daughters for years'
text:

A mother and an accused rapist are both facing charges over allegations she allowed him to rape her two young daughters.

The womanis facing charges over allegations she allowed her 64-year-old family friend to rape her two daughters, who are both aged under 10.

Reports from Ohio say Marion Stang Jr, 64, was been arrested on rape charges on Thursday.

Sarena C. Hall, 27, was also reportedly arrested a short time later.

She is accused of knowingly allowing Stang to have access to her daughters so he could allegedly sexually abuse them, WBTV reports.

Federal agents in the state reportedly arrested Stang at his Canton home on Thursday.

They arrested Hall an hour later at her property in Green.

The Stark County Prosecutors Office told US media Hall is accused of knowingly allowing Stang to allegedly sexually abuse her two children.

Court records reportedly show Stang is charged with two counts of rape and two counts of gross sexual imposition.

Hall is charged with two felony counts endangering children, according to records from the Stark Country Jail cited in reports.

Metro reports the charges were laid after a call was made urging child protective services to investigate.

Social workers probed the tip-off and notified law enforcement officials.

Both she and Stang are being held in Stark County Jail awaiting a preliminary court hearing.
description: A 27-year-old Ohio mum is accused of allowing her 'pedophile friend' Marion Stang Jr, 64, access to allegedly rape her two young daughters
